entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:33 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -40.2°C
Wind: ESE 31 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Becoming sunny late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
